text: Gorgoleptis is a genus of sea snails, marine gastropod mollusks in the family Lepetodrilidae. ==Species== Species within the genus Gorgoleptis include: * Gorgoleptis emarginatus McLean, 1988 * Gorgoleptis patulus McLean, 1988 * Gorgoleptis spiralis McLean, 1988 ==References== ==External links== * Category:Lepetodrilidae
title: Gorgoleptis
